CustomField.description: The department(s) who is/are the subject matter experts (SMEs) who can validate whether the information displayed in the article is accurate and current. Also includes the department(s) contact(s) information.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The department(s) who is/are the subject matter experts (SMEs) who can validate whether the information displayed in the article is accurate and current. Also includes the department(s) contact(s) information.
CustomField.label: Article SME Department(s)
